issue.title: P0318R1 was supposed to be revised

discussion.p:
P0318R1 was discussed in Batavia and the requested changes were made in D0318R2. In San Diego the R1 paper was voted into the WP, despite not having the requested changes. There were also changes to D0318R2 suggested on the reflector, which are incorporated below.
I've suggested that <functional> is the wrong header for these traits and they belong in <type_traits>, but I'll keep that separate from this issue.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4810.

p.ins: -?- The member typedef type of unwrap_ref_decay<T> denotes the type unwrap_reference_t<decay_t<T>>.
